text: قَالَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِىٓ إِن كُنتُمْ فَـٰعِلِينَ

translation.en.sahih: [Lot] said, "These are my daughters - if you would be doers [of lawful marriage]."
translation.id.indonesian: Luth berkata: "Inilah puteri-puteriku (kawinlah dengan mereka), jika kamu hendak berbuat (secara yang halal)".
